storyInfo:
Gnosis covertly meets with Sciurus, neither happier for it.
The Doctor proceeds to the valleys to placate the people, and comes across Weiss on the way.

attributes.content: Well, well, you actually came to us Browntails' territory for a visit all by your lonesome. You got balls, Gnosis Edelweiss.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I've always been upright and honorable.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hmph, that's rich coming from you after you were kicked out of Karlan Trade for your shady business.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I thought I'd see Ratatos here.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Anyone could bluff like that. Ratatos wasn't going to just take your word so easily.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: As I said before, it takes two to cooperate. It seems my words have reached her, and that's more than enough to me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hmph, talk all you want.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: So, since you came here all by yourself... You said last time 'things have come to this.' What's that all about?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What things have come to what?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Why do you think Enciodes proposed this transfer of powers?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hmph, isn't that because he can't take on both the Paleroches and us, and so he figured to compromise?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Compromise?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hoh, compromise.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Think again, Madame Sciurus. I dare say that your sister thinks otherwise.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ever since Enciodes came back to Kjerag, was there any single thing he did that wasn't in pursuit of his ultimate victory? Is his proposal to put the Saintess back in power really a compromise?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Here's a hint—The Ceremony.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hm...? What about the Ceremony? Don't tell me he's going to throw a fit there and refuse to turn over his powers.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The Ceremony is nigh, and there will be more trains coming in and out of the Silverashes' territory transporting both resources and people.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Take a guess, why did Enciodes himself propose to hand the Saintess his powers, even arranging for it to happen on the day of the Ceremony?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Arctosz's a short-sighted man. He thinks Enciodes will pull some kind of dirty trick once she's in control.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And so he reassigned his men to guard the valleys and the mines, even to keep an eye on the Doctor that Enciodes invited.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But the funny thing is that he doesn't know it's all pointless!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sciurus looks to a corner of the room for a brief moment. There is nothing there, but Gnosis notices it.
Gnosis looks straight at the wall there.
Ratatos, you can't be that stupid.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I will tell you what Enciodes is planning.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But you'd better see me yourself next time.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Even if I have to see his schemes come to fruition and you two imprisoned—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I won't allow myself be made a fool of again.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Now excuse me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ratatos...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Hey, Ratatos! I know you're there!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Pipe down, Sciurus.
attributes.name: Wallboards

attributes.content: There is a rumbling noise, and the wallboard slowly moves to the side. Ratatos, sitting inside, slowly rises and steps out.
You believe in what he said?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Maybe I should say I'm shocked that you never considered the possibility, sister.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But even the Saintess is on our side now!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Can Enciodes really be so unscrupulous that he...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: That he...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Don't be silly, Sciurus.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: From the moment he first trampled our faith, when he laid his train tracks straight to Kjerag and broke away from the Saintess...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: No, ever since he so calmly agreed to let his sister become the Saintess in exchange for his seat in the Tri-Clan Council, he hasn't cared.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: We all know how well those siblings got along in their earlier years. I also once thought that letting the devout Enya become the Vine-Bear Court's hostage was a brilliant move.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But now? Hmph, I wouldn't be surprised if he one day brought his men up the mountain to burn down the whole Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Don't tell me Enciodes is really going to use force...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Slow down, sister.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: There's another possibility. He could be pulling our leg.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Why...?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: To make us think he's up to something shady so we end up making the first move.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What good does that do him?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If he's not trying to have somebody else do his dirty work and off his enemies, he's trying to find an excuse to start a war and earn himself some clout in the end.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Hmph, whatever it is, we're probably all in trouble.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: How do we figure this out?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: No idea.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: None at all?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'm not exactly omniscient here.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But if he's lying, there's got to be holes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Your orders, Matriarch?
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Dig up anything you can find on Gnosis. We looked into him before, but he's had lots of dealings since his job got handed off. There should be a lot more clues now. Start there.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: You'd better not disappoint me, Gnosis Edelweiss.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Ratatos... If he was telling the truth, would you really take him in?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He's an Edelweiss! The family who got Enciodes's father killed fifteen years ago!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: They betrayed the Silverashes, but when Enciodes came back from studying in Victoria, this guy tagged along, wanting a slice of the pie.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If you ask me, he's the type who doesn't give two licks about loyalty, only profit and success. Now that he's made an enemy of his master, he's got to find a new sugar daddy to get his revenge.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Right, that's the most obvious reason.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: So you...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus... 'The Silverashes control the gates, the Paleroches have their rich farmlands and their army, but the Browntails have nothing. Why do you think we stand as one of Kjerag's three families?'
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: '...Because what we do earns the highest return.'
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I learned Grandpa's lessons just as well as you did.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Right, since I'm letting you in, there are lots of things that you really must spend some time pondering.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: As a child of the Browntails, in times like these, you need to know the best course of action. It's more than just knowing the risks of dealing with a criminal. You need to learn to assess all this yourself.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Profit always comes with risks. We need to learn how to mitigate these risks beyond just shutting them out along with the profits, dear sister.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Our biggest worry is that everything he just said was true, but also part of a lie.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Another thing.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You've gotten really close with that servant of yours, haven't you?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You mean Monch?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Monch, conch, gonch, whatever.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Don't trust anyone too much, sister.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Grr, I don't need you to tell me what to do!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'll show you how much stronger I can make Browntails without you!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I should never have given Enciodes this chance.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I have that braindead moron Arctosz to thank. Take Enya away from her scumbag brother? Don't make me laugh.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Whatever. Yucatan.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Yes, Matriarch?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Let the Paleroches know that I'll visit in a few days.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Doctor, we've entered the valley.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Sorry... Sir Arctosz never permitted any rail tracks to be built in the Paleroches' territory, and it's not in our habit to use cars.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I suppose it may not be easy for a foreigner like you to ride a burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, welcome. I am Sir Enciodes's secretary, Chester.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Please allow me to accompany you as you survey the area.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: To give Sir Arctosz the absolute peace of mind, we'll ask you to inspect each and every factory and mine site before they're declared closed.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Once you have checked everything here, both Sir Arctosz and the Great Elder will give their approval. Only then will the transfer be considered complete.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: What do you think, General Valais?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: That would be for the best, of course.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: In that case, please follow me. We'll take stroll and get a grasp of the environment and situation here.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Still, this is just way too sudden...
attributes.name: Senior Subject

attributes.content: Right, I had heard there was bad news from the last Tri-Clan Council. But that's not enough to send us running.
attributes.name: Young Subject

attributes.content: My son was hurt while working in the factory not too long ago. I'm still waiting for his medical subsidy.
attributes.name: Senior Subject

attributes.content: We... We've always believed in Sir Enciodes! He's not going to abandon us, is he?
attributes.name: Senior Subject

attributes.content: All of us put in so much work to improve the Kjerag's livelihood. He can't just shut the factory down like that!
attributes.name: Young Subject

attributes.content: What about Infected like us? We finally found work at the factory...
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: Please, everyone, calm down. Listen to me—
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Oh, nice timing, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It's been a while. I'm really sorry that we dragged you into our local affairs.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Please bear with it for a little longer. Once the Ceremony is over, the Silverashes will properly receive you.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But, before that, I think I might need your help with something.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.options: You want me to help calm these people down?

attributes.content: Sharp as always, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.options: Looks like you're doing well yourself.

attributes.content: Don't be so humble, Doctor. Your abilities are on another level. I've seen for myself.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: And we'll need your help with many other things as well.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Well then, I'll need to borrow the Doctor for this job of mine. Just for a bit. Would the Paleroches mind?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Friends and countrymen, Sir Enciodes has personally instructed me to offer all those affected an explanation on his behalf.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It so happens that the Doctor is here too. The Doctor is Sir Enciodes's esteemed guest, and Karlan Trade's current chief technical officer.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Today, together with all of you, our guest will bear witness to this message:
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: At the Tri-Clan Council, the great houses and the Vine-Bear Court reached an understanding for the interim, and will begin discussion on any follow-up matters.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Because of the grave mistakes made by Gnosis, the previous CTO, Karlan Trade must shut down all of its factories in a show of goodwill.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Once the transfer of powers is complete, the Silverash family will actively work with the Vine-Bear Court and advocate for a gradual reopening of some of our factories in a controlled, carefully-planned manner.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Please trust me and trust the Silverash family that this is for the best.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Now, as I introduced earlier, and will emphasize once more, this is Sir Enciodes's esteemed guest as well as Karlan Trade's current CTO.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Our guest is a master not only of the production and mining technologies that we are all familiar with, but also the prevention and treatment of Oripathy.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The Doctor likewise represents a medical organization that will help Karlan Trade answer the critical questions that we are all struggling with, including the medical support issue we were just discussing.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Such things would not be possible in our mountains of yore, and, together with the Doctor, Karlan Trade will bring about this new future.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: At the same time, it is Sir Enciodes's wish for the territorial subjects of the other two houses to cast aside their differences and help us build Kjerag.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: There is no need for panic. Please put your faith in Sir Enciodes and the Saintess. Have faith that Kjeragandr will never abandon Her children.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Aah, by Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Senior Subject

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Young Subject

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Now then, I will...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Wait! Hold on a minute!
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: After hearing you out... I-I have something to say!
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: Please.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It's not that we don't trust the other two houses.
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: It's just we've really had it fairly nice the last couple years thanks to Sir Enciodes. We have work, we get enough food to eat, and we even get painkillers.
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: We never had it so easy before...
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: Since we heard the factory was going to be shut down, we've all been worried that the good times are coming to an end...
attributes.name: Infected Subject

attributes.content: Please rest assured.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The Doctor, as I introduced just now, is an Oripathy scholar. Karlan Trade invited the Doctor here precisely because we are concerned about our Infected workforce's livelihood.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: So please put your faith in us, Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Yes, is there something you would like to add, Doctor?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.options: I was told Mr. Enciodes is more practical.;......;Trust alone isn't going to keep anyone fed.

attributes.content: There are also those of the mind that his ideas are impractical.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: My apologies. I have misspoken.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Very well. Looks like I'm not going to fool you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Senior Subject

attributes.content: So merciless, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Friends, it's true. I am not done yet.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: We didn't keep our internal affairs in check, and that led to you losing your jobs. That is entirely our fault.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Karlan Trade promises to keep your original positions unfilled. You will continue to be compensated, and we will arrange job opportunities with equal or even greater pay and benefits.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: And I am sure you can already tell that, unlike Gnosis, the Doctor actually understands what you truly need.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The Doctor will bring Karlan Trade the technologies that will truly benefit our day-to-day lives.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Right, this is what Sir Enciodes truly wanted all of us to know!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Sound great! I'll head back and let everybody know!
attributes.name: Young Subject

attributes.content: Good, that's very good, but don't forget Kjeragandr's teachings, young man...
attributes.name: Senior Subject

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Not at all. It's my job to speak for him.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.options: Is that the help you wanted?;......;Convincing performance.

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But I'm sure you'll agree that this was worth helping?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Okay, Doctor... I'll take you out for some fondue. My treat.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Not at all, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Actually, if it wasn't for you, I probably would've forgotten to say all that.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Okay, I will take my leave now.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.options: Mr. Enciodes will be pleased.;You can't be here just for that.;You too, Courier?

attributes.content: I'm not sure what you are talking about, Doctor.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: All the requirements have been met, just as Madame Sciurus expected.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Enciodes sent Weiss presumably as some kind of insurance policy.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: But that's not nearly enough.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: You are to ensure that things go according to Madame Sciurus's plans once Weiss is gone.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: You were followed.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What?! I didn't...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: There was only one of them, now long gone, running after the men Sciurus assigned to you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm very sorry for betraying your expectations, Sir Gnosis.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: No, perhaps this is for the better.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm prepared to be your pawn and to do whatever you say.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I'm just a researcher, Monch.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Pawns are meaningless to me. What I want is a partner that I can work with.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Proceed with the plan. Don't worry. Ratatos and Sciurus won't catch you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Monch
